title: Tasmanian Wine Country Escape Near Launceston
description: Experience the gourmet food, wine and natural beauty of Tasmania’s famous wine region, Tamar River, with a three-night riverside escape at Rosevears Hotel, a 30-minute drive from Launceston Airport. Home to over 30 sprawling wineries, berry farms, local wildlife and secret beaches (where you can spot the world’s smallest penguin), this tranquil part of the world allows you to truly disconnect. Includes a platter of local cheeses, a daily beer or wine each and a late checkout.
